document.full_text: nascar driver kyle busch was clocked by a north carolina sheriff's deputy going 128 mph in a 45 mph zone and was cited for careless and reckless driving and speeding, a law enforcement spokesman said tuesday.
document.title: busch cited for speeding in north carolina
lines_and_colors: nascar driver kyle busch was clocked by a north carolina sheriff's deputy going 128 mph in a 45 mph zone and was cited for careless and reckless driving and speeding, a law enforcement spokesman said tuesday.
